TopicTitle: Is there a mod that auto runs tests when conditions are met?

Articles.Content: Hi, Not sure if this is the right part of the forum but here goes? Is there a mod that auto runs the tests for you if the conditions are met, On some of these I've had a very hard time clicking on a tiny little spot on my rocket while it's moving to start the test and was wondering if there was a mod or hotkey to do this. Thanks in advance

I don't know about a mod for that, but do you know you can right-click the part before you want to run the test, and then click on the pin icon so the part action window stays up? That way, you can have the mouse hovered over the "run test" button waiting for all the conditions of the contract to be met.
I do now, Your the best! Thanks
